video_content.video_title: Enphase IQ 7 Microinverters for your home
video_content.video_description:
Solar panels may be on top, but it's the inverter that does all the real work. Choosing an inverter technology is the most critical decision you'll make when going solar. Learn how Enphase IQ 7 Microinverters offer the most advanced inverter technology on the market, which means higher production, greater reliability, and unmatched intelligence.

Learn more about the heart of our system here: https://enphase.com/en-us/products-and-services/microinverters

5 KWp Single Phase Complete System Kit

• Enphase energized complete solution to generate 5 kW power, and 20-25 kWh energy everyday.
  • Emmvee panels powered by microinverters, with no single point of failure, and hence higher production.
  • Burst technology that enables production even at low light and dusk conditions.
  • Higher resistance against corrosion. Dustproof and waterproof microinverters.
  • Safest system due to AC distribution structure, rather than DC structure of string inverter systems.
  • Rapid shutdown technology will prevent system damage in case of grid failure.
  • Warranty- 10 year warranty on panels, and microinverters. 5 year warranty on Envoy.
  • Panel level monitoring and Remote maintenance enabled with Enlighten app
  • Included: On the call assistance for system design and installation services.

Max AC Output Power per Microinverter     295 VA 
MPPT Range of Microinverter    27-45 V
Microinverter CEC Efficiency    97%
4 Kwp Single Phase Complete System Kit

The 4 kWp-1Phase system kit contains all components required to create, install and monitor a fully functional solar energy system. With this system, you can generate 4 kW power. This kit can be used for new installations.

With this system kit, you can run your home appliances such as fan, television, refrigerator, air-cooler, air conditioner during the day. With this system kit, you can reduce your electricity bill while staying connected to the grid.

Benefits of Enphase System

  • Higher production, best savings: Enphase microinverters operate independently, hence every panel performs to its fullest. Additionally, Enphase microinverters use a burst technology, enabling production even at low light and dusk conditions.
  • Higher Reliability: Microinverters are inherently more reliable since there is no single point of failure. Enphase microinverters have IP67 rating, hence are also dust proof and water proof.
  • Highest Safety: All Enphase systems operate on AC distribution architecture, hence no higher DC on your roof. Enphase microinverters also have in-built rapid shutdown technology.
  • Peace of Mind: Enphase microinverters come with 10 years warranty, with an option to buy additional warranty upto 25 years.
  • Panel level monitoring: Enphase has its own application- Enlighten Manager which provides you panel level monitoring and remote assistance

To contact our solar consultant, click here.

Country of Origin: China

Note: This product requires installation by a certified installer. At checkout, you can request matching to an installer in your area.

For detailed installation instructions, kindly refer to the documentation tab below.

The next-generation Envoy-S gateway provides energy usage insights, remote update capabilities, load management, and enables smart grid functionalities. 

Easy setup with the Enphase Installer Toolkit

1. Easy Commissioning

Setting up an Envoy is fast and easy with the free Enphase Installer Toolkit mobile app. It’s everything you need to build a virtual array layout, configure the Envoy for reporting to Enlighten and confirm a successful installation.

2. Quickly build the array

You can cut installation time by building a virtual array. This helps you know where each microinverter is located within the system. And it’s even faster using your mobile device’s camera to scan serial numbers.

3. Simple setup

No need for an internet connection or cellular signal, you can simply connect directly to the Envoy through the Installer Toolkit mobile app. It makes configuring the Envoy for reporting to Enlighten a snap.

4. See your success

Through the Installer Toolkit you can view a detailed installation summary report confirming a successful install. The report can be emailed or saved for review at any time.

The Enphase EnvoyTM S gateway is an integral component of the Enphase Home Energy Solution. It bridges the communication between Enphase microinverters, located on the rooftop, with the Enphase EnlightenTM monitoring software, located in the cloud. The EnvoyTM gateway and microinverters communicate via standard AC powerlines in the home. The EnvoyTM gateway and EnlightenTM monitoring software communicate via cellular or wireless internet connection. The EnvoyTM S gateway can control grid management functions and monitor PV production and monitor site consumption (consumption metering CT sold separately).

The EnvoyTM S metered is packaged with one production current transformer to enable accurate production monitoring with an accuracy of +/-2.5%.

The EnvoyTM S gateway is compatible with M series and S series microinverters.

Note: This product requires installation by a certified installer. At checkout, you can request matching to an installer in your area.

For detailed installation instructions, kindly refer the documentation tab below.

• Compatible with M and S series of microinverters
  • Can replace Envoy-R and older Envoy-S devices
  • Cellular Modem - M1 for added cellular connectivity

Please refer to the Quick Installation Guide in the “Documentaion” tab to get more details on the installation process.

The Cellular Modem connects the EnvoyTM S or IQTM Envoy to the EnlightenTM  Cloud through LTE-M cellular connectivity. It eliminates the need for an on-site Internet connection to monitor an Enphase system. The modem is pre-configured and is activated when connected to the Envoy. The Envoy collects module-level and system-level production data, and, if configured, consumption data, at pre-defined periods of time, typically at 15-minute intervals. It transmits to the EnlightenTM Cloud four times a day.

The Enphase Mobile Connect cellular modems deliver easy, reliable networking for Enphase Systems using S and IQTM  Series Envoys. 

  • Comes with 5-year pre-paid AT&T data plan
  • 5-year equipment warranty
  • Supports any number of microinverters at your site

The modem sold through the Enphase store offers an exclusive pricing package based on the number of microinverters at your site. To access the exclusive pricing plan, please log in using your existing EnlightenTM credentials.

Das Envoy-S-Gateway der nächsten Generation bietet Einblicke in den Energieverbrauch, Funktionen für Remote-Updates sowie Lastmanagement und ermöglicht die Nutzung von Smart-Grid-Funktionen.

Einfache Einrichtung mit dem Enphase Installer Toolkit

1. Einfache Inbetriebnahme

Mit der kostenlosen mobilen App Enphase Installer Toolkit (ITK) können Sie schnell und einfach einen Envoy einrichten. Es ist alles, was Sie benötigen, um ein virtuelles Modulfeld-Layout zu entwerfen, den Envoy für die Übermittlung von Berichten an Enlighten zu konfigurieren und eine erfolgreiche Installation abzuschließen.

2. Schnelles Erstellen von Modulfeldern

Sie können die Installationszeit verkürzen, indem Sie ein virtuelles Modulfeld erstellen. Auf diese Weise wissen Sie, wo sich die einzelnen Mikro-Wechselrichter im System befinden. Wenn Sie die Seriennummern mit der Kamera Ihres Mobilgeräts scannen, geht es noch schneller.

3. Problemlose Einrichtung

Sie benötigen keine Internetverbindung oder kein Mobilfunksignal. Sie können einfach über die Installer Toolkit App eine direkte Verbindung zum Envoy herstellen. Das Konfigurieren des Envoy für die Berichterstellung an Enlighten gelingt im Handumdrehen.

4. Sehen Sie Ihren Erfolg

Über das Installer Toolkit können Sie sich eine detaillierte Zusammenfassung der Installation anzeigen und damit die erfolgreiche Installation bestätigen lassen. Der Bericht kann jederzeit per E-Mail gesendet oder zur Überprüfung gespeichert werden.

Das Enphase Envoy™ S-Gateway isteinintegraler BestandteilderEnphase Home Energy Solution. Es stellt die Kommunikation zwischen dem Enphase Mikro-Wechselrichter auf dem Dach und der in der Cloud befindlichen Enphase Enlighten ™ -Überwachungssoftware her. Das Envoy™-Gateway und der Mikro-Wechselrichter kommunizieren über die Standard-Wechselstromleitungen im Haus. Das Envoy™-Gateway und die Enlighten™-Überwachungssoftware kommunizieren über das Mobilfunknetz oder eine drahtlose Internetverbindung. Das Envoy™ S-Gateway kann Netzverwaltungsfunktionen steuern und die Solarstrom-Produktion sowie den Energieverbrauch überwachen (Verbrauchsmessungs-Sensoren separat erhältlich).

Das Envoy™ S Metered ist mit Produktions-Stromwandlern ausgestattet, um eine exakte Produktionsüberwachung mit einer Genauigkeit von +/- 2,5% zu ermöglichen.

Das Envoy™ S-Gateway ist kompatibel mit Mikro-Wechselrichtern der IQ-sowie der M-Serie.

Hinweis: Dieses Produkt muss von einemzertifizierten Installateurinstalliert werden. Bei Bezahlung können Sie den Kontakt zu einem Installateur in Ihrer Nähe anfordern.
